attributes.action: address the rise in nuisance motoring by extending the Construction and Use regulations to include provisions, enforceable by the MoT test, to a) limit exhaust noise to no more than 10% above the manufacturer's original specification, and b) limit the power of installed sound systems not to exceed the level at which emergency vehicle warning sirens become inaudible.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
